ygData.subject: Rogue Assassin

Somwehere in the Rogue base, in the center of a darkened inactive 
room in the crew quarters, a moderately sided stasis cell flickers 
to life. The liquid crystal display shows an increasing reactivity 
of the bot contained, which quickly levels off as it approaches a 
normal bot's functioning range.

The chamber slides upward with an initially intense hiss, which 
gradually tapers off into an abrupt click as the chamber finishes 
rising from over top of the bot which it had been covering. 

<Awake...> thoughts trickle through the newly awakened bot's logic 
centers as its sensors begin to take in the surroundings. The bot's 
greyish visor turns slightly. The inpenitrable darkness is quickly 
washed away into a view of green and black which, the bot decides, 
could only mean night vision of sorts. The bot's vision was then 
interupted as the visor's green-black sight became bluish with 
reddish shapes around what must be heat sources.

<It has been a while.> If thoughts could have temperature, these 
ones could have caused in ice age. <This form... ahh yes, it is all 
coming back to me.> Images of a lith black form weilding black and 
silver slienced pistols dodge weapon fire, and place three well 
aimed armour piercing bullets into a bot of unknown origin's optics 
and central cicuitry flash through her logic center as it acesses 
the bot's history.

All the history files ended with one word.

<...Noir...>
